name: SNAGARI: Regreased
description:
WINNER OF THE ICT SHOWROOM TURKU 2021

Are you aware of Finnish Grill Culture? 

No? 

Then it's time to learn.

SNAGARI: Regreased is a fighting game, centered all around Finnish grill fighting culture. The characters and environments are oozing with Finnish stereotypes, jokes, and culture.

The game is made as part of a project course in game development in Turku University of Applied Sciences.

Fight as Atte, the young but cocksure beamer or Jarmo, the brawny and constantly perturbed middle-aged construction worker, in 2 different enviroments!

Play against the CPU, or locally against a friend! (Local multiplayer requires a compatible controller)

NOTE: This game contains coarse Finnish humor, and a lot of swearing. 

CREDITS:

Azurioner: Programming, Voice Acting, Animations, SFX & Music

CityMado: Programming, UI

Rektori: 2D Art

Heiggs: Level Design, Environment Modeling and Design

puzzlepappa: Character Modeling, Level Design
